page.title: 07Fordingbridge-Vimoutiers.
page.content: place in lovely sunny weather. Shops were gaily decorated and bunting adorned the streets. The actual{Twinning Ceremony}took place at 11.30 a.m. on Saturday 29th May at Fordingbridge Junior School and this was followed by a Banquet at The Burgate Comprehensive School for French guests, their hosts and dignitaries. Music was provided by the Sandleheath Band. At 2.45 p.m. the{Fun Festival began. The procession through the town was led by the Town Crier and the Hyde Band, closely followed by majorettes from Vimoutiers and twin girls from Fordingbridge who were our mascots. People in all kinds of costumes and fancy dress were then seen parading through the streets together with numerous floats of every shape and size, all making their way to the
